name: Christopher_Knight_Home_Hastings_Tufted_Faux_Leather_Storage_Ottoman
reviews: This ottoman is exactly as advertised and looks beautiful in my family room. The color is rich (I ordered red) and the tufting is nicely done. The only assembly required was putting on the legs. Easy! There's plenty of area for storage in the bench and I think it will serve me well.I would highly recommend this ottoman.
Love this item, just the right size to fit into my bathroom.
description: Complement almost any decor with the Christopher Knight Home Hastings storage ottoman bench while giving yourself a great conversation piece. It's detailed construction, inside storage space, and overall classic look is the perfect addition to your home.Includes: One (1) Storage ottoman benchMaterials: PU, wood Color: Brown, Red, Ivory, Teal, and GreyFinish: EspressoTufted top, padded topAssembly requires: YesWeight: 33- lbsDimensions: 18.25 inches high x 50 inches wide x 20.50 inches deepInterior dimensions: 9 inches high x 44.25 inches wide x 14.75 inches deepShape: RectanglePattern: SolidFurniture Room: Bedroom, Hall, Living Room, OfficeType: Standard Ottoman, Storage OttomanStyle: Casual, Contemporary, ModernMaterial: Faux Leather, WoodExact Color: BrownStyleCasual, Contemporary, ModernMaterialFaux Leather, WoodTypeStandard Ottoman, Storage OttomanShapeRectangleAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
